did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Kappa Delta Rho, Beta Chapter records, 1913-1988.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Fraternity of Kappa Delta Rho. Beta Chapter (Cornell University).

did.physdesc: Minutes, certificates, correspondence, photographs, pamphlets, and pledge meeting cards.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes, certificates, correspondence, photographs, pamphlets, and pledge meeting cards of Kappa Delta Rho fraternity at Cornell University. Also includes correspondence of William I. Myers and files kept by Horace Shackelton, 1942-1988.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes, certificates, correspondence, photographs, pamphlets, and pledge meeting cards of Kappa Delta Rho fraternity at Cornell University. Also includes correspondence of William I. Myers and files kept by Horace Shackelton, 1942-1988. KDR pin belonging to Robert R. Usher '21.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Fraternity of Kappa Delta Rho. Beta Chapter (Cornell University)

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Kappa Delta Rho. Beta Chapter records, #37-4-2130. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series I. Early Correspondence, Alphabetical by Name
Box 1

Series II. Early Records: Individuals (with photos)
Box 1

Series V. Miscellaneous Fraternity Items
Box 1, 2, Mapcase Folder 1

Series VIII. Files of Horace Shackelton
Box 3

did.unittitle: Series I. Early Correspondence, Alphabetical by Name
Series II. Early Records: Individuals (with photos)

scopecontent.p: Collection contains mostly names S-Z, only a few records of letters A-R.
Certificate of Incorporation, other legal documents
Tax-Exempt Status
Includes Digitized Files, 2005-2012 and a listing of the files.
